title: Riven
body: Ok....so i don't know if this is gonna work but, is Trinity viable on Riven like at all? I've been running Black cleaver and seen no one going Trinity even though it seems to be good with sheen proc + Phage...So is it good on Riven like at all or is it trash?

Trinity force is a waste on riven since there are at least 5 items better than a Trinity Force

Trinity Force Stats is
+250 Health
+250 Mana
+25 Attack Damage
+40% Attack Speed
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+5% Movement Speed

Mana - Waste
Attack Speed - Waste
Cooldown Reduction - Waste

and considering the price of it which is 3733, it is a good item on riven but there are better items

Considering that you get ionian boots and black cleaver, you should have enough cooldowns on her.


However, this does not mean that you should not try it and see if you like Trinity Force Riven build better than the the typical riven build.
